recipesJson.name: Another Strawberry Vanilla Custard
recipesJson.author: MattyWill
recipesJson.description: I'm not the best at writing flavor notes, descriptions or even coming up with names . But this delicious strawberry vanilla custard speaks for itself. Whip it up and enjoy.

reviews.text: I gave it 3 star due to percentages. as a strawberry custard it is not coming out that way. drop funnel cake down add custard and I would add a layer to the strawberry. if you want all cap recipe take the strawberry up a bit layer in custard and add accents. very intriguing idea on the funnel cake though great job.      https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qWO7O1hRU0A
